Literature.Title: Rational design of anti-microbial peptides with enhanced activity and low cytotoxicity based on the structure of the arginine/histidine-rich peptide, chensinin-1.
Literature.Author: Shang D, Sun Y, Wang C, Ma L, Li J, Wang X

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli AS1.349(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CGMCC 1.860(MIC=>100µM),Klebsiella aerogenes CGMCC 1.876(MIC=>100µM),Enterobacter cloacae CGMCC 1.58(MIC=>100µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae subsp. pneumoniae CGMCC 1.176(MIC=>100µM),Proteus mirabilis CICC 22931(MIC=>100µM),Acinetobacter baumannii CICC 22934(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus AS1.72(MIC=3.13µM),Bacillus cereus AS1.126(MIC=2.34µM),Lactococcus lactis AS1.1690(MIC=4.69µM),Enterococcus faecalis CGMCC 1.595(MIC=4.69µM),Enterococcus faecium CGMCC 1.2334(MIC=4.69µM)
